headline: As Trial Takes Written Questions, Spontaneity Will Move Slowly
abstract: Under impeachment’s arcane rules, senators will submit written queries to be read aloud by the chief justice. Leaders from both parties have strategized for days about what to ask.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — After six days of carefully choreographed oral arguments, President Trump’s impeachment trial is about to enter a volatile phase as senators are allowed to ask whatever they want of House prosecutors and White House lawyers.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
